DOC.brief_summary: The study aim verify VAMOS strategy contribute increase physical activity healthy eating habit among user Health Academy Program Belo Horizonte , Minas Gerais .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Strategy Designed Promote Physical Healthy Eating
DOC.detailed_description: The Health Academy Program ( AP ) important policy promote physical activity Brazil . There area infrastructure , equipment , human resource stimulate guide people physical activity community settings cost . The study aim verify VAMOS strategy contribute increase physical activity healthy eating habit among user Health Academy Program ( AP ) Belo Horizonte , Minas Gerais - `` VAMOS BEAG√Å '' . Two AP pole , belong regional administration municipality health vulnerability index select . To define location intervention VAMOS carry draw select center , potentially eligible user invite participate . Users Intervention Group ( IG ) take part daily activity offer AP , additionally , 12 week , attend educational strategy call VAMOS . The Control Group regular activity AP . The VAMOS evaluate dimension Reach , Effectiveness , Adoption ( individual level ) , Implementation Maintenance ( individual organizational level ) RE-AIM model ( Reach , Efficacy / Effectiveness , Adoption , Implementation , Maintenance ) . The reach evaluate rate participation representation among participant invite join VAMOS . The effectiveness evaluate anthropometric measurement , eat habit , physical activity level , stage change , self-efficacy , social support quality life 12 week intervention . To assess adoption investigate interest Physical Activity professional AP mediate strategy future . The implementation evaluate identify extent VAMOS conduct plan . The maintenance , individual level , estimate revaluation outcome , measure intervention , sixs month conclusion intervention . At organizational level , maintenance access semi-structured interview conduct coordinator manager AP assess feasibility continue VAMOS strategy AP . For analysis qualitative data conduct content analysis . And quantitative data , carry descriptive statistic , paired test chi-square Fisher 's exact two-way ANOVA repeat measure Wilcoxon sign rank test . Intent-to-treat analyzes use . The significance level 5 % statistical program use Statistical Package Social Sciences ( SPSS ) Windows . The overall goal study evaluate strategy promote physical activity healthy eating , call VAMOS , among user Health Academy Program Belo Horizonte , Minas Gerais . Specific objective : 1 . Evaluate effectiveness VAMOS strategy level habitual physical activity , dietary profile nutritional status participant ; 2 . To identify association psychosocial mediator behavior - self-efficacy social support - change physical activity dietary profile participant ; 3 . Analyze VAMOS strategy regard effectiveness , adoption ( individual level ) , reach , implementation maintenance .
